mapper.select: SELECT distinct sfaadocno AS WORKORDER_CODE, sfaa005 AS ORDER_SOURCE, sfaa009 AS CLIENT_CODE, SFAA010 AS PRODUCT_CODE, SFAA012 AS QUANTITY, SFAA013 AS UNIT_OF_MEASURE, SFAA019 AS REQUEST_DATE, SFAA011 AS ROUTE_CODE, SFAA021 AS SOURCE_CODE FROM DSDATA.SFAA_T WHERE sfaaent = 100 AND sfaasite = 'AM01' AND sfaastus = 'F'

SELECT distinct sfkadocno AS WORKORDER_CODE, sfka005 ORDER_SOURCE, sfka006 AS OLD_WORKORDER_CODE, SFKA010 AS PRODUCT_CODE, SFKA012 QUANTITY, SFKA013 AS UNIT_OF_MESURE, SFKA019 AS REQUEST_DATE FROM DSDATA.SFKA_T A WHERE sfkaent = 100 AND sfkasite = 'AM01' AND sfkadocno = 'AMGD01-202410003' --AND sfkacnfdt BETWEEN SYSDATE - INTERVAL '5' MINUTE AND SYSDATE
